CAD and code release for the 2024 Crescendo season, and other offseason projects:

Season Robot “Surge”:

  • CAD and associated parts: Crescendo - Google Drive
  • Code: 2024 Season - GitHub other code will be posted later

Surge_Isometric_View925×763 177 KB

Offseason & Preseason projects:

  • CAD for offseason projects (battery cart, camera mounts):

Batter_Cart_Isometric_View358×740 30.3 KB

  • CAD for preseason projects (test chassis):

Offseason_Chassis_Isometric_View1328×813 213 KB

Offseason code release!
Check out our recode of our 2024 season robot using 2025 WPILib
https://github.com/FRCTeam695/Surge_Recode_2025

Key Features

  • Phoenix 6 integration
  • High frequency odometry: Custom implementation using a NavX at 200 Hz
  • Robot relative note pose detection to autonomously drive to notes in teleop and auton using a Limelight 3 and google coral
  • Pathplanner 2025 integration

Please note that this codebase contains several unfinished projects, including gyro-based working wheel diameter calibration, Limelight MegaTag2 pose estimation, PathPlanner SwerveSetpointGenerator, and skid/collision detection algorithms. These features are still under development and we recommend teams keep that in mind when reading through our codebase.
